remarks: Implicit substitution of classes for setvar variables.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jul-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
vtocl2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
vtocl2.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
vtocl2.3 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtocl2.4 $e |- ph $.
vtocl2 $p |- ps $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ps x y $.
